General.Name: Khaitan (India) Limited
General.Description: Khaitan (India) Limited engages in trading of electrical products in India. It operates through Electrical Goods, Sugar, and Agriculture segments. The company trades in electrical products, such as fans, coolers, and pumps; and offers agricultural products. It offers its products under the Khaitan brand. The company was formerly known as Khaitan Agro Complex Limited and changed its name to Khaitan (India) Limited in 1994. Khaitan (India) Limited was incorporated in 1936 and is based in Kolkata, India.
General.Address: 46-C J L Nehru Road, Kolkata, India, 700071
